originalText.text: Dr. Spiegel is patient and kind, and amazing at what he does. I‚Äôm truly so relieved to have found a doctor with amazing bedside manner and clinical skills! His office makes scheduling seamless and everyone there is so friendly, when you walk in you feel like family.

originalText.text: Dr. Spiegel provides excellent care. He explains everything thoroughly, answers questions and works diligently to treat his patients.

text.text: Dr. Spiegel provides excellent care. He explains everything thoroughly, answers questions and works diligently to treat his patients.

originalText.text:
Dr. Spiegel, Samantha, Gwen, and Gristella ‚Äî I'm so glad to have found your clinic and added Dr. Spiegel to my father's care team to treat his chronic severe lower back and neck pain. Thank you so much for being on our side and standing in his corner throughout this journey. Your dedication and support means a lot to us!

We've been on this rollercoaster ride for quite some time. After being referred to many diff specialties across the system without significant shift of progression, I emailed the team in despair, hoping we can get off of the insanity train and that there'd be alternative solutions. We started seeing the team since September, 3 months and every visit we've had is like the first - always on time, always welcoming, never late, little to no wait, and most importantly never rushed either, which is so so rare.

Dr. Spiegel has excellent bedside manner; he's patient, sympathetic and efficient. He's opened more doors and clarity than any other specialists we've seen. The staff is super friendly. Their scheduling process is seamless and they are very accommodating.

As a family caregiver, I sincerely thank you for being a part of our community, everyone's patience and most of all, being the guiding light. üôè We look forward to continuing to work with Dr. Spiegel and the team.
